::DarkMouse::

She finally made it to the ship. She was breathing hard from 
running.  She looked around and saw the other bots.  She transformed 
into bot mode and walked up to Destructor. "OK, what do you need me 
to do?"  She gave up trying to get away and just followed her 
orders.  She knew that from now on, she would have to follow his 
orders or get slagged.  She stood there and folded her arms. "By the 
way, who's word do we have that we won't get slagged?"


::Spears::
She slowly woke up, mech fluid dripping from the cut on her head.  
She was still groggy, but she soon got her bearings and knew what had 
happened. The room caved in and now, she was not only strapped to 
table, but the table was on it's side and burried under ruble.  She 
was trapped under it all and couldn't move.  She didn't the only 
thing she coud think of,  she screamed and hoped someone would hear 
her under the pile of rubble.  She yelled,"HELP! CAN ANYONE HEAR ME!! 
HELP!"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
> Destructor opened his comm as he landed near the ark. "Dark Mouse. 
There is 
> more at stake here than getting slaged. It's the whole universe 
getting 
> slaged. Now we need your help. Just hurry up and follow orders." he 
looked 
> around to see the destrons maximals preads standing togeather. This 
sight was 
> almost a shock. This could be the benging of a new aliance.
